question:
Which of the following is/are the objective(s) of the RKVY-RAFTAAR scheme?
  1. To provide autonomy to states to plan and execute schemes for farmers as per local needs
  2. To encourage public-private partnerships for the Integrated Development of Agriculture
  3. To empower and encourage youth in the country to participate in agribusiness models based entrepreneurship
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation:
The Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana- Remunerative Approaches for Agriculture and Allied sector Rejuvenation (RKVY-RAFTAAR) has been recently approved by Union Cabinet for continuation up to March 2020 with an outlay of Rs. 15722.00 crore for 2017-18 to 2019-20. The objectives of the scheme are:
  • To strengthen the farmers’ efforts through the creation of required pre and post-agricultural infrastructure
  • To provide autonomy, flexibility to States to plan and execute schemes as per local farmers’ needs
  • To promote value chain linked production models that will help in increase in income of farmers as well as production & productivity
  • To empower farmers to risk mitigation with more focus on additional income generation activities - like integrated farming, mushroom cultivation, beekeeping, floriculture etc.
  • To empower youth through skill development, innovation and agri-entrepreneurship based agribusiness models.
  • To encourage public-private partnerships for the Integrated Development of Agriculture
